description.text: Poison applied to this +1 dagger seeps into the blade, awaiting the perfect moment for release. After a hit with the dagger but before damage is determined, the wielder of an arachnid's fang can release a stored dose of poison into the creature struck by the blade as a free action. Up to 8 doses of poison can be stored in the dagger at a time, but only 1 dose can be released on a given attack.
